english: We recovered lost time by setting out early .
chinese: 我们提前出发从而把损失的时间补了回来。

english: A variety of cyclopropanes are thus produced in good yield .
chinese: 从而以高收率得到带各种环丙烷。

english: He'll take the plunge and start his own business .
chinese: 他会采取果断行动，从而开创他自己的事业。

english: She might prefer to give him the cash and call it square .
chinese: 她也许可把钱还给他，从而了结这笔人情债。

english: So i never had the privilege of having a fag of my own .
chinese: 从而我永远也无权拥有一个供我使唤的低年级生。
从而造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Therefore alternate methods have been popular in such countries .
chinese: 从而另外一些方法在这些国家中得以盛行。

english: Tariffs provide protection and thus stimulate domestic production .
chinese: 关税提供了保护，从而促进了国内的生产。

english: The current creates magnetic field that weaken and distort the signal .
chinese: 电流会产生磁场，从而使信号减弱和失真。

english: He routed his host's calculations by calling to the rev. doctor .
chinese: 他叫了一声神学博士，从而击溃了他主人的如意算盘。

english: They "bump into" or interfere with each other and gradually spread apart .
chinese: 它们彼此“碰撞”或相互干扰，从而逐渐分散。

english: This may be combined with absorption to separate a whole range of pollutants .
chinese: 此法与吸附法联用，从而分离全部的污染物。

english: This natural system is sometimes disturbed, and irregular beats occur .
chinese: 这种天然的系统有时会发生紊乱从而出现不正常的跳动。

english: Nursing stimulates further production of prolactin and, therefore, of milk .
chinese: 哺乳本身刺激催乳激素的产生，从而生产更多的乳汁。

english: Temperature also affects the rate of decomposition and thus the nutrient flux rate .
chinese: 温度还会影响分解的速度，从而影响养分流的速度。

english: They become official sponsors and put their logos on stadium walls .
chinese: 他们成为正式赞助者，从而能在赛场周围的墙上挂上他们公司的广告牌。
